title: League of Legends low FPS?
body:
When someone throws a ability, my fps just drops down to 1 - 10. I get 30fps otherwise. (this is all medium quality)
I dropped down the resoloution, disabled all sounds and everything very low with shadows off. 60fps, but same thing. If someone throws an ability, fps drops. Please help!

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sounds to me like your PC might not meet the minimum/recommended specs to run the game.

Could you please provide me the output of dxdiag

* Press **Winkey** + **R**
  * This should open up a dialog box
  * Type **dxdiag** and press enter
* Once dxdiag has finished loading (Green bar in bottom left disappears) click **save all information**
* Either upload the saved file to a host of your choice or paste the contents of the file on [hastebin](http://hastebin.com/) or another paste site of your choice.
